actionConfiguration.body:
with CTE_MTD as (
select name AS channel,
ROUND((SUM(cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal))/(3600*1000)),2) as MTD
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
where view_date >= '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
AND view_date <= '{{moment()}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().format("YYYY-MM-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment()}}'
	and name is not null
group by channel
),
CTE_lastMonth as (
select name AS channel,
ROUND((SUM(cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal))/(3600*1000)),2) as MTD_last_Month
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
where  view_date >= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}':: date
  AND view_date <= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-31")}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1,"month").format("YYYY-MM-31")}}'
	and name is not null
group by channel
),
CTE_lastYear as (
select name AS channel,
ROUND((SUM(cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal))/(3600*1000)),2) as MTD_last_year
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
where view_date >= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}':: date
  AND view_date <= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-01-01")}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{moment().add(-1,"year").format("YYYY-MM-DD")}}'
	and name is not null
group by channel
)
SELECT * FROM(
select coalesce(CTE_MTD.channel,CTE_lastMonth.channel,CTE_lastYear.channel) as channel,mtd,cast(mtd_last_month as varchar),cast(mtd_last_year as varchar)
from CTE_MTD FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth on CTE_MTD.channel= CTE_lastMonth.channel 
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear on CTE_lastMonth.channel=CTE_lastYear.channel
ORDER BY CTE_MTD.channel
) AS T
UNION ALL
select 'Total',sum(mtd),concat(ROUND((((sum(mtd)-sum(mtd_last_month))/sum(mtd_last_month))*100),2),'%'),concat(ROUND((((sum(mtd)-sum(mtd_last_year))/sum(mtd_last_year))*100),2),'%')
from CTE_MTD FULL JOIN CTE_lastMonth on CTE_MTD.channel= CTE_lastMonth.channel 
FULL JOIN CTE_lastYear on CTE_lastMonth.channel=CTE_lastYear.channel;
